title: The mystery of Argentina’s gold: Milei admits that it was transferred abroad, without specifying the quantities or destination
summary: While the government acknowledges that gold reserves have been sent outside the country, there’s no official information available regarding the purpose of the operation. The gold is now exposed to the risk of being seized, due to long-standing claims against Argentina made by foreign creditors
